label: Darkening of the Light
i_ching_name: Ming Yi / Darkening of the Light

shadow.name: TURBULENCE
shadow.description: Emotional chaos, crisis addiction, manufacturing emergencies
shadow.thought_pattern: Everything is falling apart. Crisis mode activated.

gift.name: HUMANITY
gift.description: Deep feeling capacity that embraces the full spectrum of experience
gift.somatic_signature: Capacity to feel deeply without being destroyed
gift.thought_pattern: I can feel this. It won't destroy me.

siddhi.name: COMPASSION
siddhi.description: Feeling into all human suffering without being consumed by it
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Universal empathy, holding space for all pain
siddhi.somatic_signature: Open heart that contains all emotion
siddhi.thought_pattern: All suffering is mine. All joy is mine. I am vast enough to hold it all.

inversion_protocols.script: You are addicted to emotional crisis because it makes you feel alive and important. Gate 36 is the crisis gateâ€”it experiences life as intense and uncertain. But crisis is not required for depth. You can feel deeply without manufacturing emergencies. Your nervous system needs regulation, not more intensity.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: When you feel crisis rising, place hands on solar plexus. Breathe slowly. Ground. Ask: 'Is this actually an emergency?'

experiment.hypothesis: If I regulate my nervous system daily for 7 days, the frequency of perceived crises will decrease.
experiment.action: 3x daily: 5 minutes of slow breathing, grounding, nervous system regulation. Journal actual emergencies vs perceived.

success_criteria.target: Fewer perceived emergencies, more emotional stability
